languages.text: "Клянусь сиянием Трона, любят же псайкеры говорить загадками! Лети теперь да гадай — что там у них приключилось!" {n}Абеляр обеспокоенно теребит усы.{/n} "Да только ничего хорошего, по голосу ясно. Боюсь, мы опоздали, не успев хоть что-то предпринять. Паршивое чувство".

traits.locale_text: "Клянусь сиянием Трона, любят же псайкеры говорить загадками! Лети теперь да гадай — что там у них приключилось!" {n}Абеляр обеспокоенно теребит усы.{/n} "Да только ничего хорошего, по голосу ясно. Боюсь, мы опоздали, не успев хоть что-то предпринять. Паршивое чувство".

languages.text: "By the Throne's radiance, those psykers certainly love speaking in riddles! And now we are supposed to go haring off and make guesses about what has happened!" {n}Abelard nervously fiddles with his moustache.{/n} "Still, his tone made it clear that it is nothing good, and I fear that it is already too late. A rotten feeling, I daresay."
languages.original_text: "Клянусь сиянием Трона, любят же псайкеры говорить загадками! Лети теперь да гадай — что там у них приключилось!" {n}Абеляр обеспокоенно теребит усы.{/n} "Да только ничего хорошего, по голосу ясно. Боюсь, мы опоздали, не успев хоть что-то предпринять. Паршивое чувство".

traits.locale_text: "By the Throne's radiance, those psykers surely love speaking in riddles! And you now have to fly there, wondering what happened!" {n}Abelard nervously fiddles with his moustache.{/n} "The voice made it clear that it is nothing good, though. I fear that it is too late for us to try and do at least something. A lousy feeling for sure."

"By the Throne's radiance, those psykers surely love speaking in riddles! I fear that it is too late for us to try and do at least something. A lousy feeling for sure."

A rotten feeling, I daresay."

"By the Throne's radiance, those psykers certainly love speaking in riddles! And now we are supposed to go haring off and make guesses about what has happened!" {n}Abelard nervously fiddles with his moustache.{/n} "Still, his tone made it clear that it is nothing good, and I fear that it is already too late. A rotten feeling, I daresay."

languages.text: «¡Por el resplandor del Trono, a esos psíquicos les encanta hablar con acertijos! ¡Y ahora se supone que debemos marchar sin rumbo y adivinar lo que sucede!» {n}Abelard se manosea nerviosamente el bigote.{/n} «Pero su tono ha dejado claro que no se trata de nada bueno y me temo que es tarde para resolver la situación. Una sensación muy desagradable».
languages.original_text: "By the Throne's radiance, those psykers certainly love speaking in riddles! And now we are supposed to go haring off and make guesses about what has happened!" {n}Abelard nervously fiddles with his moustache.{/n} "Still, his tone made it clear that it is nothing good, and I fear that it is already too late. A rotten feeling, I daresay."

traits.locale_text: «¡Por el resplandor del Trono, a esos psíquicos les encanta hablar con acertijos! ¡Y ahora tiene usted que volar hasta allí, sin saber lo que ha ocurrido!». {n}Abelard se manosea nerviosamente el bigote.{/n} «La voz dejó bien claro que no era nada bueno. Temo que sea demasiado tarde para que podamos hacer nada. Desde luego la sensación de impotencia es terrible».

languages.text: “王座之光在上啊，那些灵能者实在是太爱兜圈子！恐怕我们只能猜测到底发生了什么事情！”{n}阿贝拉德紧张地拨弄着他的胡子。{/n}“但无论怎样，他的声音我听得很清楚，那里不会有什么好事，而且我担心恐怕来不及了。老实说，这种感觉真的很糟糕。”
languages.original_text: "By the Throne's radiance, those psykers certainly love speaking in riddles! And now we are supposed to go haring off and make guesses about what has happened!" {n}Abelard nervously fiddles with his moustache.{/n} "Still, his tone made it clear that it is nothing good, and I fear that it is already too late. A rotten feeling, I daresay."

traits.locale_text: “王座之光在上啊，那些灵能者实在是太爱说谜语了！您恐怕必须飞奔回去，弄清楚到底发生了什么事情！”{n}阿贝拉德紧张地拨弄着他的胡子。{/n}“他的声音说得很清楚，那里不会有什么好事。我担心，我们现在才采取行动，恐怕已经太迟了。这种感觉可真糟糕。”

languages.text: « Par la radiance du Trône, ces psykers ne savent-ils donc pas parler clairement ? Nous voilà obligés de nous rendre sur place pour savoir ce qu'il se passe ! Cela dit, le ton de sa voix n'augure rien de bon, {n}continue Abélard en touchant nerveusement sa moustache.{/n} J'ai bien peur qu'il soit trop tard pour intervenir, aussi regrettable que ce soit. »
languages.original_text: "By the Throne's radiance, those psykers certainly love speaking in riddles! And now we are supposed to go haring off and make guesses about what has happened!" {n}Abelard nervously fiddles with his moustache.{/n} "Still, his tone made it clear that it is nothing good, and I fear that it is already too late. A rotten feeling, I daresay."

traits.locale_text: « Par la radiance du Trône, ces psykers ne savent-ils donc pas parler clairement ? Nous voilà obligés de nous rendre sur place pour savoir ce qu'il se passe ! Cela dit, le ton de sa voix n'augure rien de bon, {n}continue Abélard en touchant nerveusement sa moustache.{/n} J'ai bien peur qu'il soit trop tard pour intervenir, aussi regrettable que ce soit. »

languages.text: 「玉座の輝きからすると、あの異能者たちは、きっと謎かけが好きなのでしょうな！何が起こったのかを推測するためにも、大急ぎで出立せねばなりません！」{n}アベラルドは神経質に口ひげをいじる。{/n}「ですが、その声音は、それが良いものでないことは明らかでした。もう手遅れなのではないかと不安です。嫌な予感がします」
languages.original_text: "By the Throne's radiance, those psykers certainly love speaking in riddles! And now we are supposed to go haring off and make guesses about what has happened!" {n}Abelard nervously fiddles with his moustache.{/n} "Still, his tone made it clear that it is nothing good, and I fear that it is already too late. A rotten feeling, I daresay."

traits.locale_text: 「玉座の輝きからすると、あの異能者たちは、きっと謎かけが好きなのでしょうな！何が起こったのか、不思議に思いながら飛んでいかなければなりません！」{n}アベラルドは神経質に口ひげをいじる。{/n}「その声は、それが良いものでないことは明らかでした。せめて何かしようと思っても、もう遅すぎるのではないかと不安です。嫌な予感がします」

languages.text: "Beim Glanz des Throns, diese Psioniker verstehen es wirklich, in Rätseln zu sprechen! Und jetzt laufen wir wie aufgescheuchte Hühner herum und stellen Vermutungen an, was passiert ist." {n}Abelard zupft nervös an seinem Schnurrbart.{/n} "Allerdings hat hat sein Tonfall deutlich gemacht, dass es nichts Gutes ist, und ich fürchte, es ist bereits zu spät. Ein schreckliches Gefühl, wenn Ihr mich fragt."
languages.original_text: "By the Throne's radiance, those psykers certainly love speaking in riddles! And now we are supposed to go haring off and make guesses about what has happened!" {n}Abelard nervously fiddles with his moustache.{/n} "Still, his tone made it clear that it is nothing good, and I fear that it is already too late. A rotten feeling, I daresay."

traits.locale_text: "Beim Glanz des Throns, diese Psioniker verstehen es wirklich, in Rätseln zu sprechen! Und nun müsst Ihr dort hinfliegen und fragt Euch, was geschehen ist!" {n}Abelard spielt nervös an seinem Schnurrbart herum.{/n} "Die Stimme hat aber deutlich gemacht, dass es nichts Gutes ist. Ich fürchte, dass es zu spät für einen Versuch ist, zumindest irgendetwas zu unternehmen. Ein schreckliches Gefühl."
